'''''Vinyar Tengwar 40''''' is the fortieth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|39|41}}

==Contents==
* E.L.F. News

* "''[[Narqelion]]'' (facsimile)"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien
* "''Narqelion'' and the Lexicons: Some Notes on the Earliest Elvish Poem" — Christopher Gilson

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
